name: R0LL ON...
description: The Game R0LL ON is all about rolling a Blue coloured SPHERE (the PLAYER) towards LEFT and RIGHT side respectively by using 'A' key (for LEFT) and 'D' key (for RIGHT) without getting Collided with the Yellow blocks (ENEMY).  To pause the game in between, you have to click ESCAPE button so that the game will be paused and you can resume the game by clicking the RESUME button. This game is Level based game and the points will be scored while the player is in movement. If the player Dashed with the YELLOW block means, the player hast to play from the beginning of that particular LEVEL. Even if the player goes out of the RED coloured floor also, the player should play from the beginning of that particular LEVEL.  This game is designed and developed in UNITY Software. This game contains 3 LEVELS in it.
